Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Place sugar, coconut, and butter in a bowl and blend with an electric mixer until thoroughly mixed. Add the egg yolks and egg white; beat until everything is well incorporated. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch pie dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 45 minutes. Let cool to room temperature before serving.
Place the roasting pan in the preheated oven and bake until the custard is golden brown on top, approximately 30 minutes.
Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature for about 30 minutes. Serve right away or refrigerate until ready to serve.
